text: @SteveScalise If these 'games' include raising the stimulus amount to reasonable for low/no income families so that we have a chance to survive Covid-19 as well, I say play on. It would come in handy. All we can afford is Ramen noodles and can't find any. FYI-people don't live long w/o food.
